---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Request or document a maintenance task
title: ''
labels: maintenance
assignees: ''

---

**Maintenance Task Description**
A clear and concise description of the maintenance work needed (e.g. dependency update, code refactor, cleanup).

**Reason for Maintenance**
Explain why this maintenance is needed (e.g. security vulnerability, performance improvement, technical debt reduction).

**Timeline**
Any specific timeline or deadline for completing this work.

**Impact**
Describe any expected impact on users or services during maintenance.

**Additional Context**
Add any other context, links, or references related to this maintenance task.
